Name: Sydney Hospital and Sydney Eye Hospital

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8:30am-5pm by appointment. General reference assistance available. Copying services for books, journals and original records to A3. Referral to paid researchers is available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit and proof of identity required. At present Sydney Hospital does not have a funded archival position. A modicum of research support is provided by the Administrative Officer.
